topics.body:
So I went to the Flee Market with my Mom today (There's a place called the Big Top Flee Market here where I live that has a bunch of cool stuff in it!)

And guess what I saw? Some Little kid (Probably like 11/12)  Dressed up like Ash ketchem! He looked good in it too! IT WAS SO FUCKING CUTE!

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/544c4304636872508bbd0000#post_544c4304636872508bbd0000
There's two Anime guys selling stuff there, One who I haven't seen in a LOOOOONG time, he used to always be there but he left and I haven't seen him in like 4 years.

Another one was the really nice lady! She said she's not gonna be there next week since she's gonna be sailing stuff at a Con coming up.

Also just a few minutes ago when I let my Dog go out to use the bathroom.

Fucking Albino Frog sitting on my porch!
